text: Crystal City is a city in the state of Texas in the United States. It is the county seat of Zavala County. The 2020 US census said that 6,354 people lived there. The "San Antonio, Uvalde and Gulf Railroad" stopped in Crystal City. Crystal City was home to a large internment camp in World War II. It was the largest internment camp for Germans and those of German descent in the US. Almost all the children and many of the wives interned here were American citizens. Most were held here for four years. == References == Category:County seats in Texas Category:Cities in Texas Category:Imprisonment and detention Category:World War II
title: Crystal City, Texas
